tm.settings.interval.hint: How fast to animate the rotation if enabled (recommended between 10 and 200)

tm.settings.customImage.hint: Use a custom image instead (leave blank to use a built in image)

tm.settings.announce.hint: If enabled, will send a chat message for the new combatant

tm.settings.announceImage.hint: If enabled, will include the token image in the turn announcements

tm.settings.startEnabled.hint: If enabled, will place a marker at the location a token started its turn
